name: bandwidth
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.seed: cd server && sequelize db:create && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
